post.title: Halloween Treat Bags for the Band
post.description:
Hi Band Families,
The North Royalton Band Boosters would like to give our students a treat after t
post.content:
Hi Band Families,

The North Royalton Band Boosters would like to give our students a treat after the football game on Halloween and with your help it can happen. We are asking for candy donations to be sent with your student to the green band room by Wednesday, October 29. We are using Sign up Genius to make sure we get can get enough candy and that we have a variety. Follow the link below and sign up for the candy you would like to donate.

Sign up

If you have any questions please contact Becky at thecozzens@yahoo.com.

Thanks!
